Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you come here to do some gathering
near the summit? The soil here is prized
because it contains all kinds of things.
<PAGE>
Ah, I've got to run. Sorry, <MYNAME>.
Catch you later!

Seems like this has the scribblings of a
bunch of news stories on it. Tina must
have dropped it. Where could she be...

Hmm, what to do? Should I go chase
after Tina?
Run after Tina now
Give it to her later

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is info I collected about the
gathering points. We should be fine as
long as we have this!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Many thanks. It seems like I'll be able
to get the materials I need for smithing
thanks to your information network.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. That's great! Keep up your
training.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, I will. Well then, I must get
going.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What's going on, <MYNAME>? You're drenched
in sweat.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, this is my notepad! So you picked it
up and then came running after me?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
These memos are really important to me.
If I lost them, I'd be so upset.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish I could do something in return,
but I've actually got to get going
again.
<PAGE>
I'll definitely return the favor next
time. Look forward to it, okay? Thanks
again.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have some business with Tina?
Right now, she's...

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, you came.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
My notepad!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I was looking all over for it. But why
do you...

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I see. That's great. I was
so sure I had lost it. Thanks!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
S-Sorry, but can I return the favor next
time? I'm so tired from running around
searching.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for waiting, Iroha. Shall we
continue our conversation?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes please.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. I have something I
need to talk with Iroha about now. See
you next time.
